item.title: Product Review: Taylor Digital Thermometer
item.description: Pros Price:Â It can typically be found on sale online for $16-$20. Temperature Alarm: This works great in the HLT to know when strike or sparge water has reached its target temperature. It can also be used in the boil kettle to notify you when the wort is approaching a boiling point and the most susceptible to boil overs. Timer: Use this to keep track of when the mash and boil are done.
